name: Keep My Notes Backup
summary: Learn about .MYNOTESBACKUP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create a MYNOTESBACKUP file in Keep My Notes, tap the menu icon in the top left corner and select Backup. MYNOTESBACKUP files are created on the SD card of the Android device.

description: A MYNOTESBACKUP file contains a backup of notes created by Keep My Notes, a notepad and memo app for Android devices. It stores a backup of one or more notes, which include text, font color and size, and the theme style. MYNOTESBACKUP files are useful for saving a backup of important notes and transferring notes between devices.

instructions: To open a MYNOTESBACKUP file in Keep My Notes, tap the menu icon in the top left corner and select Restore.
